name: CryptococcosisTestsForCryptococcusSpeciesByCultureAndIdentificationMethod
title: Cryptococcosis (Tests for Cryptococcus species by Culture and Identification Method)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for lab test names to detect Cryptococcosis in a culture),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify laboratory tests names),(Inclusion Criteria: Cryptococcosis),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
